Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.collections.distributed

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDistributedCollectionWriteAckListener
    Instances of this interface are used to be notified of the acknowledgment of write requests by remote nodes.
    IReplicable
    Wrapper around a IByteArrayStore.WriteRequest that needs to be replicated across the cluster.
    IReplicationHandback
    Opaque hand-back used between distributed collections and the replicator in order to promote object reuse.
    IReplicator
    An instance of this interface is used by distributed collections to replicate writes across the cluster.
    IReplicatorClusterState
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of maintaining the aspects of the cluster state relevant to the operation of the Replicator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DistributedByteArrayStore
    Store implementation which wraps a IPersistentByteArrayStore for the purpose of replicating all IByteArrayStore.WriteRequests to other nodes in the cluster.
    Replicator
    Helper used by distributed collections to replicate write requests.
    ReplicatorClusterState
    Class encapsulating the cluster state relevant to the Replicator.
    ReusableWriteRequestContext
    Class which facilitates ChannelMessage reuse in the context of publishing WriteRequestMessage payload.
    WriteQuorumCalculator
    Class which calculates the global write quorum (i.e.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ReplicationException
